channel.title: HL2 - disable crosshair..
channel.description:
I have decided to try playing without the crosshair in half-life 2. I managed to disable the crosshair, but I cannot figure out how to disable the lines where the ammo and health info would be. Does anyone know the solution? Thank you.

item.title: HL2 - disable crosshair..
item.dc:creator: wayfare
item.description:
Grey Acumen:

I see what the original poster is talking about. Even when you set crosshair 0 and hud_quickinfo 0, you still end up with 2 thin curved static lines where the quickinfo would normally be shown. He’s trying to get rid of these too so that he has absolutely no assist to his aiming, but still keep the rest of his hud that shows his ammo and health at the bottom of his screen.

You got it, I ended up downloading a file that did this by replacing the true type files… now I want to go back. It turned out to be a lot less entertaining than I presumed it would be. maybe I will try with just the quick info as well… Thank you again everyone.
